quote: To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power. – Ayn Rand
fact: In the average lifetime, a person will walk the equivalent of 5 times around the equator.
joke: A man walked in to a bar with some asphalt on his arm. He said “Two beers please, one for me and one for the road.”
